CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 8, 1958, pg. A15 reads: " "The Pause That Refreshes" - These gay young guests are taking a break on the porch of the Alpha Fraternity House, the scene of various affairs for the younger set, during a recent party.  Left to right, seated: Farris Harris and Frances Pace.  Standing: Roberta Durham, Calvin Hutchinson, Sara Dorman and Ronald West. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait from left, seated: Farris Harris and Frances Pace; standing: Roberta Durham, Calvin Hutchinson, Sara Dorman, and Ronald West, gathered on porch of Alpha Psi Alpha fraternity house
